appellant: Premoon is the sitting tenant and in cultivating possession.
Premoon supplies sugarcane crop to Talhar Mill.
Premoon has been rendered landless while Devo's grant was upgraded.
Land was granted in open Katchery according to a compromise.
respondents: Misjoinder of Jumoo and Misri as respondents.
Land was leased to Devo during 1957-68 and 1968-69.
Devo has been in cultivating possession for 15-16 years.

key_points: Settlement dated 6-2-1974 confirmed Premoon's cultivating possession.
Katchery papers showed land was granted with mutual consent.
Devo conceded to grant of disputed land to Premoon twice.
judgment.decision: Revision upheld and grant of S. Rs, 367 restored to Premoon.
